page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE (cont.)
page.content: Victoria, Sophie and lots of other people for ten minutes and then the whistle goes. When the whistle goes we line up in our classes on the yard. Then we go in and the teacher marks the register and takes the money for the trips and things like that. At about 9.30 we go to prayers at about 10.00 a.m. we come back and have our English lesson. My favourite English book is called Hadyn-Richards. At 10.40 a.m. the buzzer goes and we go out to play and we have a snack. O usally have crisps. At 11.00 a.m. we come in and have our maths leson. At 12.00 we have our dinner break. I take a packed lunch to school which is sandwiches. My favourite sandwiches are salmon. At 1.00 p.m. we go back in and have another lesson, I like drawing. At 2.20 p.m. the buzzer goes and we go out and play games like tic.
